important_topics: Banks' unique position in scam prevention

Regulatory landscape and accountability for banks

fraud_tips: Train employees to recognize and respond to potential scams.
Empower customers with tools and technology to identify scams.
Be proactive in educating customers about scams.
Encourage customers to add trusted contacts to their accounts.
